price: ߊ߲ ߡߴߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߕߐ߬ߢߍ߯ ߘߋ߬ ߸ ߞߏ߬ߣߌ߲߬ ߊ߬ߟߎ ߟߋ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߕߐ߬ߢߍ߰ߒߕߋ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamā ẓalamnāhum walākin kānū humu al-ẓālimīna
